title: Alcohol Intoxication Treatment
author: WebMD Editorial Contributors

sections.heading: Call 911 if the person has these symptoms of alcohol poisoning:
1. Stop Further Drinking
bullets: Leave the place where the alcohol is, or put the alcohol away.
Coffee, cold showers, and other traditional remedies don't work.
Never allow someone to drive when they are drunk.
Keep the person away from machinery, bicycles, skateboards, swimming pools, and other hazards.
Watch for signs of alcohol poisoning.

sources: College Drinking Prevention, National Institute on Alcohol Abuse and Alcoholism: "Facts about alcohol poisoning.”
Centers for Disease and Prevention: "Alcohol and Public Health: Frequently Asked Questions.”
UC Davis Health Center: “Alcohol Poisoning: How to Help a Drunk Friend."
meta_description: Alcohol intoxication and alcohol poisoning are dangerous. WebMD tells you how to help a person who has had too much to drink.
